title: ðŸ‘‘Linda + RHONJ Lady Drama & Real World New Orleans!
itunes:title: ðŸ‘‘Linda + RHONJ Lady Drama & Real World New Orleans!
description:
Another supersized episode this week, first Danny chats briefly with ðŸ‘‘Linda Pellegrino, who is in town visiting and wanted to say hello. Then Danny recaps this week's Real Housewives of New Jersey, which featured a shocking cast performance of something called "Lady Drama," while Frank Sr. sat on a pool noodle. Danny also touches on Summer House and the news of the Ashley/Demon Darby separation on RHOP.


After the Bravo talk, Danny sits down with ðŸ‘‘Melissa Beck, one of the stars of The Real World Homecoming: New Orleans, which is out now on Paramount+. They discuss life after her initial season of The Real World, what's to come, and the incredible earworm that is "Come On Be My Baby Tonight."


Melissa Interview: 35:00ish


BOOK: Smarturl.it/unremember

Twitter: @DannyPellegrino

Instagram: @DannyPellegrino

Patreon: www.Patreon.com/EverythingIconic
